original_text: That will be a bad time for women who are soon to have a baby. It will also be a bad time for those women who have little babies.
korean_text: 그 날에는 아이 밴 자들과 젖먹이는 자들에게 화가 있으리로다

sentences.original_text: That will be a bad time
for women who are soon to have a baby
It will also be a bad time
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 어려운 시간이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for those women who have little babies
